channel.title: MAGE & RANGE somethin not rite
channel.description:
......uhhh i need some help...
i need to know how to fix the spells and stuff for mage..... all the spells work and everything is fine and stuff but...... when i atk using mage i never miss......yet i also never hit any dmg its always 0.......yet i get exp as if i did hit dmg..... so yea any help would be nice.....
Range.... for range its really messed up..... crystal bow seems to work perfectly.....i can hit dmg and i get exp..... but with other bows like regular short bow and bronze arrows..... i try to atk then it says you have no arrows in your quiver when i have like 100..... help would be appreciated.....

item.title: MAGE & RANGE somethin not rite

item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

mage fix : at your spells look if you have hitdiff = randomdamgeamount or when you use a basic server you might have to add hitdiffupdate(); to

range fix: your hasarrows is only set for rune arrows you have to change that…
